item.title: Keys in Database
item.description: There are 8 types of keys in DBMS(Database Management system). Keys are used to help developers to identify a row in a relation(table). Understanding each keys will help you understand and develop a database. In modern world, data is growing at a rapid pace. So does the demand for professional data analyst. In this article, I will help you understand the keys in DBMS. I suggest you have memorize these terms as it will help you build a logical database and if later on you want to expand the program, you don’t have to start over.
